strIntroduction: 韓國最大規模的文化藝術殿堂，不僅是引領韓流文化K-POP舞蹈，還是傳統韓式文化的四物表演、打擊樂器，深入瞭解韓國文化的捷徑，熱愛韓流絕不能錯過！
strTitle: 【韓式動感COREART】K - POP舞蹈教學、傳統打擊樂表演、四物表演體驗

strIntroduction: Have you ever dream of traveling locally without searching for information previously? Let oppa(the local tour guide) take you around visiting those must see sightseeing spots in Busan with the hired car to create the one and only memory of your trip!
strTitle: Local tour around Busan Attractions

strIntroduction: Under the approval of the United Nations, come and take a guided tour to the border of South and North Korea! Besides paying a visit to sightseeing spots, such as Panmunjoma and JSA, you can also enjoy the mysterious atmosphere and experience the historical significance of the armistice zone.
strTitle: A day-trip to Joint Security Area (JSA), Panmunjom

strIntroduction: Known as one of the New7Wonders of Nature, Jeju Island has significant and breathtakng scenery both on land and under the sea! Wanna have a look what's the New7Wonders scene under the sea level look likes? Just come and let Seogwipo Submarine offers you the opportunity to soak in the stunning view!
strTitle: Seogwipo Submarine adventure tour

strIntroduction: When Fanta-Stick’s beating starts, your heart-beat will go up to the highest with the percussion sounds. You should never miss this heart-beating sounds of powerful percussion rhythm and Heart-filling melodies of beautiful Gukak!
strTitle: 20% Off! Fanta Stick Show Ticket

strIntroduction: Various lifestyles prevalent during the Joseon Dynasty can be experienced in Korean Folk Village, where the customs and lifestyles of past generations of Korean have been faithfully maintained without impairment!
strTitle: Korean Folk Village Ticket

strIntroduction: I hate carrying huge luggage when I'm abroad. Do you have the same annoyance like me every time you have a flight? Let luggage delivery service to and from airport and Seoul gives you the most of your valuable travel!
strTitle: Incheon and Gimpo International Airport luggage delivery service

strIntroduction: Does museum sound uninteresting to you? Have you ever imagined that you'll burst into laughter at there? The biggest 4D museum in Korea that breaks down the stereotype of museums and combines art pieces with interaction! Wanna try something fun? Come to the Alive Museum and make some funny faces beside those paintings!
strTitle: Korea 4D Alive Museum tickets

strIntroduction: It's time for winter skiing! Pack up your luggage and let's go! Follow KKday for some skiing fun!
strTitle: Korea Gangwon "High One" two-day ski trip

strIntroduction: Is there any place to go instead of shopping in Seoul? Actually, traditional palaces, museums and significant scenery also brim over the city. No more hesitation! Come and join in the culture exploration tour!
strTitle: Korean culture tour to Insa-dong, Jogyesa Temple, Unhyungung Palace and the furniture museum

strIntroduction: Do you always dream of bumping into your ideal oppa/ noona? The special tour arranged for groupies, from Apgujeongrodeo to major entertainment companies and televisions. Come and maybe you'll encounter your oppa/ noona!

strIntroduction: You can not only appreciate the beauty of traditional architecture but touch and experience Korean traditional culture in Bukchon Hanok Village. Just come to create your own totem with dyeing!!
strTitle: DIY Dye in Bukchon Hanok Village

strIntroduction: 旅行中最享受的兩件事就是購物和美容啦！讓我們帶你前往韓國在地人最推薦的溫泉勝地，體驗各式季節限定的特色浴池。充飽電後再到著名的驪州outlet血拚一番，低於免稅店的價錢絕對讓你買到手軟，捨不得離開！
strTitle: 【韓享受！】利川溫泉樂園、陶藝村、 驪州outlet一日遊

strIntroduction: 站在厚厚的冰層上，用簡單用具就能體驗冬季限定的冰魚垂釣活動，加上刺激的雪盆體驗，絕對是今年冬天不容錯過的冬季冒險！此外，漫步在絕美的白色南怡島，為你的韓國行留下一些浪漫的回憶吧！
strTitle: 【冰魚歷險記】 親手釣冰魚＋雪橇體驗＋南怡島一日遊

strIntroduction: Known as "the Hawaii of Korea," Jeju island has marvelous ocean view. Besides, Monsant café, opened by G-Dragon, can make you not only feel the charm of GD but also glance beautiful scene. With shuttle service, you can easily travel around Jeju island.
strTitle: 1-day Western Jeju Island tour

strIntroduction: Known as "the Hawaii of Korea," Jeju island provides various outdoor activities. To glance the most attractive beach in Jeju, Udo island is a must-go spot. After that, you can follow the shuttle to meet the sunset with rape flower in Seongsan Ilchulbong!
strTitle: 1-day Eastern Jeju Island tour

strIntroduction: Do you feel tired or have edema after these days having fun in Seoul? Han-nan SPA, the well-facilitated spa center with skillful massagists, situated at the center of Seoul. Not only does it have convenient location, but close to the famous sightseeing spot, Namsan Tower and Myeong-dong shopping area! Remember to relax yourself and let fatigue be swept away over here in your next Seoul trip!
strTitle: [Detox, relax and get pretty] Korea Seoul Han-nan SPA

strIntroduction: Remarkable mime show performed by one of the well-known Korean artists, Lin He Pil. This show is all about daily life, but combined with magic, mime, shadow show, and sand painting.
strTitle: [Mime that makes you laugh out loud!] Seoul Funtasy show

strIntroduction: Do you want to explore Korea more than only Seoul? Just start the journey in Jeonju and realize more about Korean traditional culture in Hanbok!
strTitle: [Travel in Hanbok] Jeonju One-day Tour

strIntroduction: 想滑雪但不會滑怎麼辦？KKday推薦您參加這個基礎滑雪團！專業的教練從最基本的裝備穿脫開始教起，一小時半的課程讓你學會基本的滑雪動作，快來跟著我們一起稱霸滑雪場吧！
strTitle: 【韓國滑雪入門】伊利西安滑雪場，最適合新手的基礎滑雪團

strIntroduction: One of the must-see shows in Korea, Nanta show combines Korean instrument which can break down national boundaries. Regardless of language and age, everyone will definitely fall for this show! Hey! Next time when you're in Korea, remember to experience this special drama culture!
strTitle: “NANTA” Show Ticket at Hongdae

strIntroduction: As a show combing with music and dance, Dancing Grandpa Over Flowers is no longer a simple performance, but a comedy that will surely amazed you! With English and Chinese subtitles, there's no confusion while watching the show.
strTitle: Special Show in Seoul: Dancing Grandpa Over Flowers

strIntroduction: As the most special tour in Seoul, we not only make you learn how to cook the famous Korean Bulgogi, but take you to the historical Changdeokgung Palace, experience the customs in Namsan Hanok Village, and see unexpected natural beauty at Cheonggyecheon Stream!
strTitle: Seoul City Tour: Changdeokgung Palace Namsan Hanok Village Korean Food Cooking Class

strIntroduction: The Yongsan Dragon Hill Spa is a charcoal sauna permeated with an oak fragrance created by traditional heating techniques. A Visit to the Luxurious “Dragon Hill Spa” in Seoul.
strTitle: Dragon Hill Spa Ticket

strIntroduction: Visit the impressive Hwaseong Fortress and the Hwaseong Haenggung Castle. And then, see the latest lineup of Samsung products at the Samsung Electronics building in Seocho-dong, explore the National Museum of Korea and visit the Unhyeongung Royal Residence.
strTitle: Hwaseong Fortress, Samsung D'light & Unhyungung Palace

strIntroduction: Rainbow cake! Marshmallow ice cream! Cheese Ribs! Beef and Pork Intestine! You may ask "Can traditional Korean snack survive in this competitive food world?" Not until you try them will you know how tasty they are. Seize this food adventure opportunity; it won't let you down!!
strTitle: 【Food in Korea】Makgeolli & Bindae Tteok, Korean Wine & Pancake

strIntroduction: Featured cafe has become a hit in Korea recently. Just put down your work and head to the suburb to enjoy a lovely day!
strTitle: Seoul Suburbs Dreamy Camera Cafe＋Dumulmeori one-day tour

strIntroduction: As long as you've come to Busan, you must not skip the harbor view! The local tour bus is surely your best choice! With tour guiding by local Busan residents, you can have a deeper understanding of this city!
strTitle: Busan Night view tour: Classic Busan Route

strIntroduction: Have you ever imagined yourself savoring fried chicken and sweet rice wine in sauna just like characters in Korean drama? Insadong sauna will be your best choice to enjoy traditional Korean sauna!
strTitle: Insadong Korean traditional sauna (Hanjeungmak)

strIntroduction: 一直令人夢寐以求的韓國婚紗，現在以呈現新娘自然優雅的氣質為主，色階柔和淡雅，特寫氣質滿分，全景則有完美比例。不僅model拍起來好看，在照片中每對新人看起來都宛如韓劇男女主角一樣美麗帥氣，浪漫又優雅的氛圍絕對值得一試！
strTitle: 【小資情侶專屬】首爾人氣婚紗攝影棚＋韓式妝髮＋平價韓國迷你婚紗攝影

strIntroduction: 今年冬天限定行程，讓我們帶你品嚐韓國又大又香的草莓，再一起搭著雪盆冒險、並到晨靜樹木園欣賞五色燈節，帶你體驗最豐富又有趣的冬天！
strTitle: 【好大顆的草莓！】有機草莓園，晨靜樹木園燈節，雪盆體驗一日遊

strIntroduction: Pacific Land, located within the complex of Jungmun Resort, the facility offers three performances upon admission including dolphin show, sea lion show and monkey show. There is also a special dolphin water show available for viewing. Don't forget to bring your children to enjoy a lovely day here!
strTitle: Jeju Island Pacific Land Premiere Tickets

strIntroduction: 今年冬天，讓我們前往草莓農場採草莓，製作草莓果醬！再帶您去春川有名九峰山天空步道及參觀晨靜樹木園＂五色星光庭園展＂豐富你最浪漫的韓國行！

strIntroduction: These beginner classes are introductory courses for those new to cooking or to Korean food. The cooking classes are taught in English. Classes last 1.5-2 hours (including lunch or dinner time& market tour).

strIntroduction: 照片提供我們一輩子的紀念，永恆的回憶。我們與多家韓國攝影工作室合作，以合理的價格提供韓式全家福照攝影體驗服務，快和家人一起留下最溫馨動人的瞬間！

strIntroduction: Have you ever fed seagulls? With a sea breeze sweeping on your face, what a lovely experience it is! Besides, you can learn how to make Zhajiangmian at home. You don't have to envy Korean drama characters anymore!

strIntroduction: Jeju chartered tour really suits family! With Chinese/English speaking tour guide and shuttle service, you can go wherever you want!

strIntroduction: 以壯麗的自然景觀聞名的濟州島，滋潤愛情的浪漫旅程，一同乘坐山房山郵輪，遊賞大長今拍攝地－挾才裡海岸，聯合國教科文組織地質公園指定地－山房山，以及濟州島五大火山及十大美景之一的山房窟寺等美景！
strTitle: 【浪漫首選】濟州島山房山遊覽船

strIntroduction: The one and only all-female percussion group in the world! Bursting with unique rhythmical styling and emotional involvement, DRUM CAT's superb skills in high-speed drumming and unique combination of various sounds are a treat for both the eyes and ears!
strTitle: Heart-Pounding Show in Seoul, DRUM CAT

strIntroduction: 叫好叫座！好評再開的梵谷特展這次來到濟州島啦！獨一無二的全新視、聽覺饗宴！跨越傳統展覽模式，加入聲音和光影重新詮釋，注入現代感而重生的梵谷畫作，歷久彌新的經典大師作品你絕對不能錯過
strTitle: 【互動式感官饗宴】梵谷印象濟州特展

strIntroduction: A trip to the city's busiest marketplaces is a great way to soak up vibrant spirit of Seoul. Besides, it's necessary to shop for a variety of items such as herbal medicine, fresh fruit, textiles and semi-precious stones.
strTitle: Traditional Open Market Tour

strIntroduction: As known as the very first theme parks that can arouse resonance among people, Poopoo Land offers you a totally different but eye-opening experience. You can not only enjoy some interesting facilities, such as poopoo slide and get familiar with your poop, but try some delicious poop-shape cake over here!
strTitle: Poo Poo Land in Seoul

strIntroduction: No matter how old we are, we can all return back to our childhood in ToyKino! You can both soak in the world of American characters and the world of Korean and Japanese traditional figurines!
strTitle: Other Great Spots to Go in Seoul: ToyKino Museum

strIntroduction: 冬天當然就是要玩雪才過癮！還在擔心帶著小孩出國該去哪裡玩嗎？KKday推薦你最沒有危險性的雪橇雪盆，讓你能夠安全的徜徉在雪世界中！

strIntroduction: ILSAN Aqua Planet, the very first aquarium combining aquarium and zoo within an arena, is a 4,300 ton new-concept aquarium featuring both aquatic animal, dolphins and terrestrial animal, tigers. Located near by the transportation hub, ILSAN is surely one of the recommended place for you to visit!
strTitle: ILSAN Aqua Planet Ticket

strIntroduction: Jeju Aqua Planet is the biggest aquarium in Asia, with more than 50,000 pieces of different marine creatures! Besides, it equips with Ocean Arena and Marine Science museum. Both adults and children can have a great time here!
strTitle: Jeju Aqua Planet Ticket

strIntroduction: 63 City Building in Yeouido stands 264 meters above sea level and is considered as one of Seoul’s well known landmarks. The 60th floor of 63 City Building has been newly remodeled into an art museum, offering a place for art exhibitions, magic shows, and various cultural experiences. Besides the mentioned activities, you can also spend time on the beautiful scenery of the Hangang River right here!
strTitle: Seoul 63 Square

strIntroduction: E-World, the amusement park situated around subway station is where Korean drama, "Hyde, Jekyll, Me" was filmed! Although used to be known as an industry city, Daegu has blended heavy industrial urban scenes with its exclusive scenery. Only 1.5 hours needed from Seoul to Daegu! Stop hesitating! Let's go to Daegu!
strTitle: E-World Amusement Park & 83 Tower in Daegu

strIntroduction: With a professional English-speaking guide and a private car, you can surely have an awesome trip! No matter you wanna have a half or full-day tour, you can arrange your schedule whatever you want!

strIntroduction: 跟著韓綜的腳步玩韓國準沒錯！KKday帶你到太陽的後裔的御用咖啡廳朝聖，體驗劇中約會的浪漫氛圍，再到【超人回來了】三胞胎的家松島公園乘坐水上TAXI，體驗最超值的松島一日遊！

strIntroduction: Are you looking for a leisurely trip in Korea? Besides shopping in Seoul, you should also pay a visit to the suburb! Including Dreamy Camera Cafe, Yangpyeong Rail Bike, and Dumulmeori, this one-day tour will definitely create great memories!

strIntroduction: 總是幻想身處於浪漫的韓劇場景嗎？那麼千頌伊與都教授約會的首爾知名地標＂南山首爾塔＂絕對是你不可以錯過的景點。讓夜景搜查團帶你前往南山塔及漢江搭乘＂漢江遊覽船＂，一起發掘首爾的魅力吧！

strIntroduction: Take a deep breath, darkness is coming! The Dark room, located in Insadong, has already attracted worldwide escape game lovers come and experience. Are you ready for this exciting challenge? This unique dark space tour will definitely bring you an unforgettable memory!

strIntroduction: There's no man and boy can escape! Seoul Figure Museum W, paradise for anime fans, where everything that should be here is here! strIntroduction: 已經去過了南怡島、小法國村，想去找些新鮮的樂子嗎？想去近郊玩、親近大自然，又不想搭大眾運輸搭車轉到暈頭轉向？那坡州一日遊絕對是最適合你的選擇！融入歷史文化、藝術、購物等旅遊必須元素，豐富的行程包君滿意！

strIntroduction: 大阜島是位於京畿道的一個小離島，也是人氣綜藝節目＂青春不敗＂的主拍攝地，我們特別為您安排了大阜島一日遊，獨家又豐富的行程，愛韓國的你千萬不能錯過！

strIntroduction: 겨울한정! 한국의 대표 겨울과일은? 바로 딸기! 크고 맛있는 딸기를 마음껏 따서 먹고 잼도 만드는 겨울 필수코스 ,딸기 농장체험. 한겨울 추위와 맞서는 알록달록한 빛의 세계로 떠나보아요, 오색별빛축제! 경기도 토속음식 또한 빼놓을 수 없는 매력

strIntroduction: Enjoy your chartered car tour right after cruise ride! Besides renting a car and taking a bus, it's a more convenient way to explore Busan. We'll arrange a private shore excursion for you that you can select where you would like to visit in Busan. Are you still wondering your schedule in Busan? Just come and have your hired-car trip!
strTitle: Busan one-day tour: Private Customized Excursion for Cruise Passangers

strIntroduction: 冬天來到韓國，千萬不要錯過精彩的華川山川魚慶典！快跟著KKday的腳步，一起High翻這個冬天吧！
strTitle: 【冬季必遊】 華川山川魚慶典 晨靜樹木園一日遊

strIntroduction: 想來韓國盡情滑雪卻不懂基本滑雪技巧? 想入住滑雪渡假村但又不懂坐車? 跟我們來就對了! 除了專業中文教練外, 更特別安排入住BEARS TOWN滑雪渡假村, 感受充分享受滑雪樂趣！晚上加遊晨靜樹木園夜燈節, 讓您度過一個白色浪漫的難忘冬天假期!
strTitle: 【韓國滑雪趣！】 韓國BEARS TOWN＋晨靜樹木園燈節滑雪兩日遊

strIntroduction: With KKday airport shuttle service, you don't have to carpool with others!

strIntroduction: Situated nearby the suburb of Seoul, Daemyung Ski World is always full of tourists in Winter. Having 13 different pistes offers everyone from beginners to experts a great skiing experience! If you're now planning a ski tour, never miss this amazing ski world!
strTitle: Two-day Ski Package in Korea: Daemyung Ski World

strIntroduction: 想要自由行又擔心交通轉車不方便?自助包車旅遊除了專屬座車及司機導覽之外，亦可協助調整建議行程安排，讓您的韓國自助旅遊零障礙。除此之外，還有機會搭乘加拿大華人插畫家 Andrew Hou筆下人物的聯名車款，讓你輕輕鬆鬆玩遍首爾！
strTitle: 【就愛自由行】首爾包車自助旅遊服務

strIntroduction: 最新奇又豐富的行程景點大集合！KKday帶你到韓國人最愛去踏青的熊公園，和多達數百隻超萌的韓國半月熊親密接觸， 加上「我們結婚了」御用約會行程湖畔鐵路自行車及五色星光夜燈節，一起發現韓國最浪漫的一面吧！

strIntroduction: Even "Running Men" are fascinated with the natural air-con of Gwangmyeong Cave! If you are looking for summer resort, Gwangmyeong will be your best choice!
